item.title: Error while adding donator
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Hello,

When i wanted to add donator, i got this error:

.\client.java:6066: illegal start of type if(checkLog("donators", playerName)){ ^ .\client.java:6066: <identifier> expected if(checkLog("donators", playerName)){ ^ .\client.java:6066: ';' expected if(checkLog("donators", playerName)){ ^ .\client.java:6066: illegal start of type if(checkLog("donators", playerName)){ ^ .\client.java:6066: ';' expected if(checkLog("donators", playerName)){ ^

this is my code: [code]public void easyer(){

if(checkLog(“donators”, playerName)){
donator = 1;
}else
if(!checkLog(“donators”, playerName)){
donator = 0;
}
}[/code]

please help me

Read full topic
